definition: living by or given to victimizing others for personal gain
details:
adjective
- living by or given to victimizing others for personal gain
= example: living by or given to victimizing others for personal gain
= synonyms: predaceous
- living by preying on other animals especially by catching living prey
= example: living by preying on other animals especially by catching living prey
= synonyms: rapacious
- characterized by plundering or pillaging or marauding
= synonyms: marauding, raiding
